data.name: Red Wukong
data.detailed_description:
In the depths of planet Paragon, inside the Arcan Mines, the great drills never stop working. But that day a strange red light was all around, workers talked about some energy popping up in the air. Tremors interrupted and broke some tracks, some platforms fell. And than, in a weird Terminator style, Red Wukong was there. Now he will face the Kaizan Empire that controls the planet, but no one knows his purposes.

Red Wukong is a 3d action platformer with a lot of combat and exploration, each level has different enemies and secrets, also the world map where you enter the levels is highly explorable and hides some surprises. Some gameplay aspects are heavily influenced by old snes platform classics, bringing then to the new generation. The game is powered by Unreal 5 and use assets from Paragon game, where does the Wukong base character come from. New techniques like Lumem for global Illumination are widely used.

Features:

  • Combat - Action and challenge in a fierce combat, Red Wukong can attack and defend with his staff, he can also jump on enemies heads to cause damage and in some levels it has some hidden powers.
  • Exploration - Each level has a lot to explore, in some parts of the game you can find Relic Dungeons which are small hidden maps where Red Wukong has to beat a wave of enemies to pass and get the reward.
  • Airtubes - A mix of Mario pipes and Donkey Kong barrels, you will use a lot of airtubes!
  • Jetpacks - Some types of jetpacks are also available for Red Wukong to use, each of them has its own mechanics.

data.short_description: Red Wukong is a 3d action platformer with a lot of combat and exploration, each level has different enemies and secrets, also the world map is highly explorable and hides some surprises. Some gameplay aspects are influenced by snes platform classics, bringing then to the new generation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz Intel Core i5 3450 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700K / AMD Ryzen7 2700X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX2060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
